I was never actually satisfied with this author's works. It's OK to be able to create both vanilla and NTR works, just don't put them together in the same book. This title misses the most important tag: NTR. The MC of the first story might be dense, but he is actually an alpha. He wouldn't give up pursuing the girl he desires. He fucked the girl even when it was not his "schedule". When he was banned, he kept finding ways to fuck e.g. outside the apartment. He doesn't care about the rules. Fuck the rules, only betas follow the rules. Also the envy look in the manager girl's eyes when she saw the MC and her sister having sex in the living room is so satisfying. She never understands the MC's feelings. And those two assholes with gray hair and glasses are so annoying, always barging in uninvited in the most crucial moments, even in the final chapter. They can just fuck themselves. The second story is decent. The third story stupid.

The Main Story which is the Apartment is not NTR to the Main Character since he's not in any romantic relationship at all. The woman he loves is just not romantically inclined to anyone and is just a pushover who loves sex. So it's more of an unrequited love of the MC, but not NTR. In short, both the Manager and the MC is a "Whore" and a "Manwhore". The second story is vanilla. The third story is NTR but not forced. Overall, this one is not great, not terrible.

Necrozys put it well. I've been there, I've done it, and I have quite the legally procured game collection. And if I could pay for my favorite doujins translated into english, I fucking would. Or just pirate it and stick 500 yen in the author's patreon.

@Brighton92 I actually still visit it just to add any promising hentai in a list so that if one day I decide to pay for a month, I can download as much good stuff as possible and maybe share it somewhere after :p They have some monopoly over some artists that you can basically not find anywhere else.  

@Johnny3043 Personally, it depends on the situation. As a student, I pirated everything, games/music, etc. When I worked, I bought all my games and subscribed to Google Music, never pirated anything and now I'm a student again so if I can spare a few bucks, I'm not gonna hesitate.
